name: Radius Raid
description: Radius Raid is a space-themed shoot 'em up where you fend off relentless enemies determined to destroy you. The game has 13 enemy types and 5 powerful upgrades.
author: Jack Rugile

name: Yet Another Doom Clone
description: A 3D first person shooter that is a minimalist recreation of classic Doom.
author: Nicholas Carlini

name: Synthesizer
description: Synthesizer keyboard complete extensive waveform customizations. Record and playback your music makings.
author: ChatGPT

name: Wacky Calendar v1.0
description: This calendar helps you keep track of important holidays like National Poop Day.
author: Mark Valentino

name: Peter Alert
description: Looks like Peter Griffin has infected your computer! Quickly close out the alerts in this fun game.
author: Erik Houdini

name: 2048 Game
description: Play the classic 2048 puzzle game, where you merge matching tiles to reach the elusive 2048 tile and beyond, testing your strategy and planning skills with every move!
author: Ania Kubow

name: Canvas Bird
description: Canvas Bird is a quick flappy bird like game written with JavaScript canvas.
author: Yiotis Kaltsikis

name: SpeedRead
description: A text based application made so that users can increase their reading speed.
author: Steven Blanco
